Package com.company.menu

Class MenuList

java.lang.Object
com.company.menu.MenuList
public class MenuList extends Object
This is the class that contains a static list of all the MenuItems that are added

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MenuList()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createMenuItem()
    Creates a new MenuItem.
    static void
    displayMenu()
    Display the current MenuItems that are added
    static ArrayList<MenuItem>
    getmItemList()
    This method returns the List of MenuItemObjects that have been added.
    static void
    processMenuListToCSVFile()
    This method processes the mItemList and writes to a CSV file with the necessary information, so that the added MenuItems can be retrieved by reading the generated the CSV File when the application is relaunched.
    boolean
    removeMenuItem()
    Removes a MenuItem from the mItemList.
    void
    updateMenuItem()
    Updates a MenuItem from the mItemList.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuList

      public MenuList()

  • Method Details

    • createMenuItem

      public void createMenuItem()
      Creates a new MenuItem. The user has to enter inputs accordingly to the prompts given.

    • displayMenu

      public static void displayMenu()
      Display the current MenuItems that are added

    • removeMenuItem

      public boolean removeMenuItem()
      Removes a MenuItem from the mItemList. User is expected to give inputs based on the prompts provided.
      Returns:
      If the item entered is removed successfully a boolean value of true is returned and returns false if unsuccessful.

    • updateMenuItem

      public void updateMenuItem()
      Updates a MenuItem from the mItemList. User is expected to give inputs based on the prompts provided. This function enables the following attributes of the MenuItem to be changes: - Name - Price - Type - Description

    • getmItemList

      public static ArrayList<MenuItem> getmItemList()
      This method returns the List of MenuItemObjects that have been added.
      Returns:
      mItemList (List of MenuItem Objects that have been added)

    • processMenuListToCSVFile

      public static void processMenuListToCSVFile()
      This method processes the mItemList and writes to a CSV file with the necessary information, so that the added MenuItems can be retrieved by reading the generated the CSV File when the application is relaunched.
